member.name: T:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient
member.summary: A BetterTogether client that connects to a BetterTogether server

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.Id
member.summary: The id assigned to this client by the server

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.PollInterval
member.summary: The delay between polling events in milliseconds. Default is 15ms

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.Players
member.summary: Returns a list of all connected players

member.summary: The underlying LiteNetLib.NetManager

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.Listener
member.summary: The underlying LiteNetLib.EventBasedNetListener

member.summary: Creates a new BetterClient

member.summary: Sets the interval between polling events. Default is 15ms

member.summary: Sets the initial states of the client

member.summary: Connects the client to the target server
member.returns: True if the connection was successful

member.summary: Disconnects the client from the server

member.summary: Sends a state object to the server
member.param: The name of the state to set

member.summary: Sends a state object to the server. This state object is owned by the player and only this client or the server can modify it
member.param: The name of the state to set

member.summary: Sends a state object to the server

The object to send. Must be MemoryPackable

member.param: The name of the state to set
The object to send. Must be MemoryPackable

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.GetState``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the latest state of a key available on this client
member.typeparam: The expected type of the object. Must be MemoryPackable
member.param: The name of the state object
member.returns: The deserialized object or the default value of the expected type

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.GetPlayerState``1(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the latest state of a player specific key available on this client
member.typeparam: The expected type of the object. Must be MemoryPackable
member.param: The name of the state object
member.returns: The deserialized object or the default value of the expected type

member.summary: A delegate for RPC actions on the client

member.summary: Registers an action to be invoked when a PacketType.SetState packet with a specific key is received

member.summary: Removes an action from the registered events

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.PingServer(System.Int32,LiteNetLib.DeliveryMethod)
member.summary: Pings the server and returns the delay. Only call once at a time
member.param: The maximum time to wait for a response

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.PingPlayer(System.String,System.Int32,LiteNetLib.DeliveryMethod)
member.summary: Sends a ping to a player and returns the delay. Only call once at a time
member.param: The id of the target player

member.name: E:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.Connected
member.summary: Fired when the client is connected to the server. The string is the id assigned to this client by the server. You can also use Client.Id as it is assigned before this is called. The List is the list of all connected players exluding this player

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.OnConnected(System.Action{System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}})
member.summary: Fluent version of Connected

member.name: E:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.Disconnected
member.summary: Fired when the client is disconnected from the server

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.OnDisconnected(System.Action{LiteNetLib.DisconnectInfo})
member.summary: Fluent version of Disconnected

member.name: E:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.PlayerConnected
member.summary: Fired when a player is connected to the server. The string is the id of the player

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.OnPlayerConnected(System.Action{System.String})
member.summary: Fluent version of PlayerConnected

member.name: E:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.PlayerDisconnected
member.summary: Fired when a player is disconnected from the server. The string is the id of the player

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.OnPlayerDisconnected(System.Action{System.String})
member.summary: Fluent version of PlayerDisconnected

member.name: E:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.Kicked
member.summary: Fired when a player is kicked from the server. The string is the reason of the kick

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.OnKicked(System.Action{System.String})
member.summary: Fluent version of Kicked

member.name: E:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.Banned
member.summary: Fired when a player is banned from the server. The string is the reason of the ban

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterClient.OnBanned(System.Action{System.String})
member.summary: Fluent version of Banned

member.name: T:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer
member.summary: The BetterTogether server. Create one with a max player count then use the Start method to start the server on the specified port. Set the DataReceived Func<NetPeer, Packet, Packet> for your data validation and handling.

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.PollInterval
member.summary: The delay between polling events in milliseconds. Default is 15ms

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.MaxPlayers
member.summary: The max amount of players

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.AllowAdminUsers
member.summary: Whether this server allows admin users

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.NetManager
member.summary: The underlying LiteNetLib.NetManager

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.Listener
member.summary: The underlying LiteNetLib.EventBasedNetListener

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.ReservedStates
member.summary: The reserved states for the server. Only the server (and admins if setup correctly) can modify these states

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.States
member.summary: Returns a read-only dictionary of the states on the server

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.Players
member.summary: Returns a read-only dictionary of the players on the server

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.Admins
member.summary: Returns a list of all the players that are admins

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.Banned
member.summary: Returns a list of all the banned IP addresses

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new server

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.WithPollInterval(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the interval between polling events. Default is 15ms

member.summary: The max amount of players

member.summary: Whether this server allows admin users

member.summary: Sets the banlist for the server

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.WithReservedStates(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Sets the reserved states for the server

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.Start(System.Int32)
member.summary: Starts the server on the specified port
member.param: The port to start the server on. Default is 9050
member.returns: true if the server started successfully, false otherwise

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.Stop
member.summary: Stops the server

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.Kick(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Kicks a player from the server

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.IPBan(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Bans a player from the server using their IP address

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.SyncState(BetterTogetherCore.Packet,System.Byte[],LiteNetLib.DeliveryMethod,LiteNetLib.NetPeer)
member.summary: Syncs the state to all connected peers
member.param: The peer from which the state originated from

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.DeleteState(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the state with the specified key

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.ClearAllGlobalStates(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Clears all global states except for the specified keys

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.DeletePlayerState(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the player state with the specified key

member.summary: Clears all player states for the specific player except for the specified keys

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.ClearAllPlayerStates(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Clears all player states except for the specified keys

member.summary: Registers a Remote Procedure Call with a method name and an action to invoke.

member.summary: A delegate for RPC actions on the server
member.param: The peer that invoked the RPC

member.summary: Calls a registered RPC on this server

member.summary: This function will be called when a packet is received. Return null to ignore the packet.

member.summary: Fluent version of DataReceived

member.summary: Sends a packet to everyone except the specified peer

member.summary: Gets the peer id from the peer

member.summary: Attempts to get a peer by id

member.summary: Checks if a string is a valid GUID
member.returns: true if the string is a valid GUID, false otherwise

member.summary: Checks if a string starts with a GUID
member.returns: true if the string starts with a GUID, false otherwise

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.BetterServer.IsAdmin(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a player is an admin
member.returns: true if the player is an admin, false otherwise

member.name: T:BetterTogetherCore.Packet
member.remarks:
MemoryPack GenerateType: Object
BetterTogetherCore.PacketType Type
string Target
string Key
byte[] Data

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.Packet.Type
member.summary: The type of the packet

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.Packet.Target
member.summary: The target of the packet. This can be an id or a name like "server"

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.Packet.Key
member.summary: The key is used differently depending on the packet type. For example, in a SetState packet, the key is the state name.

member.name: P:BetterTogetherCore.Packet.Data
member.summary: The data of the packet. This can be anything Memorypack can handle.

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.Packet.#ctor
member.summary: Empty constructor

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.Packet.#ctor(BetterTogetherCore.PacketType,System.String,System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Constructor for a packet

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.Packet.New``1(BetterTogetherCore.PacketType,System.String,System.String,``0)
member.summary: Create a new packet with the specified data type. MemoryPack can't serialize object so generics are used.
member.param: The object to send. Must be Memorypackable

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.Packet.GetData``1
member.summary: Deserializes the data of the packet to the specified type
member.typeparam: The type of the expected object

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.Packet.SetData``1(``0)
member.summary: Sets the data of the packet to the specified object
member.param: The object to serialize. The object must be Memorypackable.

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.Packet.Pack
member.summary: Serializes the packet

member.name: T:BetterTogetherCore.PacketType
member.summary: Various types of packets

member.name: F:BetterTogetherCore.PacketType.None
member.summary: Default value. Doesn't mean anything.

member.name: F:BetterTogetherCore.PacketType.SetState
member.summary: Used to set the state of a peer

member.name: F:BetterTogetherCore.PacketType.DeleteState
member.summary: Used to delete the state of a peer

member.name: F:BetterTogetherCore.PacketType.Init
member.summary: Sent to the peer with the current state and other data

member.name: F:BetterTogetherCore.PacketType.Ping
member.summary: Used for all ping related stuff

member.name: F:BetterTogetherCore.PacketType.RPC
member.summary: Used for RPC calls

member.name: F:BetterTogetherCore.PacketType.SelfConnected
member.summary: Sent to the connected peer when the connection is established

member.name: F:BetterTogetherCore.PacketType.PeerConnected
member.summary: Sent to all peers when a peer connects

member.name: F:BetterTogetherCore.PacketType.PeerDisconnected
member.summary: Sent to all peers when a peer disconnects

member.name: F:BetterTogetherCore.PacketType.Kick
member.summary: Sent to kicked peers

member.name: F:BetterTogetherCore.PacketType.Ban
member.summary: Sent to banned peers

member.name: T:BetterTogetherCore.RpcMode
member.summary: The mode of an RPC

member.name: F:BetterTogetherCore.RpcMode.Target
member.summary: The RPC is sent to a specific peer

member.name: F:BetterTogetherCore.RpcMode.Others
member.summary: The RPC is sent to all peers except the sender

member.name: F:BetterTogetherCore.RpcMode.All
member.summary: The RPC is sent to all peers including the sender

member.name: F:BetterTogetherCore.RpcMode.Host
member.summary: The RPC is sent to the server then back. Why would you use this? Feel free to enlighten me.

member.name: F:BetterTogetherCore.RpcMode.Server
member.summary: The RPC is sent to the server

member.name: M:BetterTogetherCore.Utils.FastStartsWith(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Fast implementation of StartsWith

string Key
